channel.title: Need help on my server
channel.description:
Hi, Im Weave I need help on my server, I use Narbscape 4 as my source, i have modified ALL the files so they show what i want to show instead, I compiled with my no-ip compiler thingy and ran the server. The problem is, nothing that i changed has had any effects on my server, the welcome message is still the same and the menus too. Anyone got tips? Should I use another source? Is Narbscape even a Source?
Thank you, Weave.

item.title: Need help on my server
item.dc:creator: @Dreams_Weave Dreams Weave
item.description:
@Dreams_Weave wrote:

getsome:

u missed up a}

Where does it go before the public void sentence or after lol?

EDIT: Nvm I got it lol. Thank you so much its working now! My server is almost complete YAY![br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 02:31:54 PM[/size][hr]Ok here goes a second question,
if i want the area 2951-9798 to 2970-9770 to be non-pk what do i write in the client.cfg?

EDIT2: How could I add a chest in my world that would do the following:
Add full ghostly, and yellow phat, take away 2000m from person openning it in exchange,
Only Admins can open it. Thank you I hope it isnt too much, I really am a noob at coding my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on my server
item.dc:creator: @Dreams_Weave Dreams Weave
item.description:
@Dreams_Weave wrote:

Ok I will try that.

BTW Can anyone tell me what to change on this piece of code? It is the only one with errors in my compiler.
This is what appears on my compiler:

client.java:6455: illegal satrt of expression public void ReportAbuse(String report, int rule, int mute) ^ 1 error Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer...

I hope this isnt too noob, I am new at these Private Servers.

Thank you, Weave.

Read full topic
